message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its potential value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and the benefits it offers.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth and the benefits it offers.

Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer. While I understand your desire to save, the value of this product is truly exceptional. I could consider coming down to $1,025,000. This offer reflects a more accurate assessment of the product's worth and the potential return on your investment.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $975,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth and the benefits it offers.
